display_long_description:
Blobtown: Create anything!

# Physics Combat

Build any melee weapon and battle friends and foes—battle axe, deadly lance, or even a humiliating turkey leg. Damage scales with weight and sharpness. Can you build the best weapon?

[media]

# Create Your Avatar
In Blobtown, it’s super easy to create your own avatar! Want to recreate your favorite character? Come up with an OC? Or maybe spend a day as a chair—or a bowl of soup? Your imagination is the only limit!
[media]

# The Best Creative Tools
Blobtown’s super simple yet powerful creation tools, combined with the VR camera, let you build anything and record the fun to share with the world. There are already tons of Blobtown creators with their own studios and characters. It’s super easy to get started!

[media]

# Make Friends

You will never be alone in Blobtown. We are working hard to build the best community, come and be part of it.

[media]

# Player Store
Use Blobium, our in-game currency, to buy creations from other players. Whether it’s a complete avatar or just some accessories to enhance your own designs, the choice is yours! Think you’ve made something amazing? Become a seller and start building your own empire!

[media]

# Explore the Blob Universe
Blobisland will quickly feel like your second home, and we’re adding beautiful new locations with every update!

# This is Just the Beginning
We’re in early access, but we have *a million* ideas to make Blobtown the best place to spend your time in VR. LET US COOK!
